note.p: Solicitor. Admitted to practice, 1859; worked with his father, Michael Browne, at Wheeler Gate in Nottingham.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/3508/51/37)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 28 November 2019)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 28 November 2019)
Post Office directory of Cambridgeshire, Derbyshire, Nottinghamshire, Leicestershire, & Rutlandshire.
